news.title: More Americans are financing groceries with buy now, pay later loans — and more are paying those bills late, survey says
news.summary: Consumers are using buy now, pay later plans to pay for essentials such as groceries. Concerns around the economy grow as consumers seek to save money.

news.title: Plane tickets are getting cheaper as domestic travel demand weakens
news.summary: Airlines are trimming their domestic schedules as leisure traveler demand comes in lighter than expected. Airlines are cutting back on domestic flights to meet demand for leisure travelers.

news.title: Amazon and Nvidia say all options are on the table to power AI including fossil fuels
news.summary: The tech companies have invested mostly in renewable power, but they are now navigating a changed political environment. The tech companies are investing in solar, wind and other renewable energy.

news.title: International tourism to the U.S. slumps, but Americans can't stop traveling overseas
news.summary: United Airlines and Delta Air Lines say international and premium travel is robust. Domestic coach-class travel and some corporate travel has slowed, they say.

news.title: How TikTok’s rise sparked a short-form video race
news.summary: TikTok's dominance in short-form video has reshaped social media. Rivals like Meta, YouTube and LinkedIn are investing to compete for users.

news.title: The NYSE’s most famous trader says it’s a great time for traders and shares how to play the volatility
news.summary: Peter Tuchman reveals the indicators he uses to map trend direction. Stock trader Peter Tuch man reveals indicators he used to map trends direction. Peter Tuchsman is a stock trader and author.

news.title: It’s time to buy tech stocks: 4 ways to find winners while the market is down
news.summary: Investors can take advantage of a chance to buy quality stocks at cheaper levels. Use tools that help them buy shares at the right price.

news.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner is a mooch. How can I protect her?
news.summary: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment,” he says. “He’s got to do something.”

news.title: ‘I have an out-of-state adviser in a Republican state’: How can I tell if his political views influence his investment advice?
news.summary: “I don’t know how he feels about the current decisions being made by the administration,” he said. “I’m not sure if he’s happy about it.”

news.title: ‘I’m literally afraid to look at my balance’: I have $300K in a 2025 target-date fund. Is there a chance it will recover?
news.summary: “I have no idea at this point how much I have lost,” he says. “I’ve lost a lot. I’m in shock.”
